# Unicode.GeneralCategory.surrogate

**Case**

A surrogate code point.

## Declaration

```swift
case surrogate
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Surrogate` (abbreviated `Cs`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.surrogate
